name: Bubble Pop: Classic Puzzle
description:
Shoot Bubble - pop and blast to match bubbles!
More than 2,000 free levels with free boosters to enjoy!

This time we made something new with a classic type of game.
We add many different gameplays and hope you can enjoy to experience them very well

How to Play Shoot Bubble:
Shot bubble bullets to other bubbles!
Bullets will pop color matched Bubbles!
Make them all explode!

Features of Shoot Bubble:
You can accumulate bubble energy to get different Items or Skills.
We have many amazing Items and Skills combinations are waiting for you to explore.
They will help you to overcome difficult Levels and Achieve higher score!
The whole process will be very interesting!

Hope you will have a good time!
developers: Word Puzzle & Fun Games For Free
